name: md-graph
description: Visualize your markdown files as a network graph. Easily navigate files and see relationships.

md-graph.showColumn.description:
- active – in the currently focused column.
- beside – (default) other than the current.
- one, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine – respective editor columns.

md-graph.openColumn.description:
- active – in the currently focused column.
- beside – other than the current.
- one (default), two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine – respective editor columns.

md-graph.autoStart.description: Should Markdown Links automatically start when a markdown file is opened.

md-graph.fileTypes.description: File type extensions that should be parsed by md-graph

enumDescriptions: Show the full graph, including every file in the workspace
Show a graph of the currently open file and its neighbors
md-graph.graph.defaultMode.description: Default viewing mode to show when opening the md-graph panel

md-graph.graph.focusNeighborDepth.description:
How many levels of neighbors should be shown in focus mode.
A value of 1 will only show immediate neighbors

md-graph.graph.fadeDepth.description:
How far away should a file be from the current file before its node is faded.
Set to 0 to not fade any nodes

scripts.vscode:prepublish: yarn build:webview --mode production && yarn build:extension --mode production
